sentence.Network_en: Several hundred people twirl around the ballroom dance floor.
sentence.Network_cn: 几百人在舞厅的舞池里旋转。

sentence.Network_en: All around me leaves twirl to the ground.
sentence.Network_cn: 在我周围，树叶打着转儿纷纷飘落到地上。

sentence.Network_en: She did a quick twirl to show off her dress.
sentence.Network_cn: 她轻快地一转身,炫耀自己所穿的衣服.

中国首部新魔幻杂技剧《魔幻金沙》 ... 钢叉飞舞 steel fork playing 滚灯 twirling lamp 吊环 the swinging ring.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: probably an alteration (by association with whirl) of tirl, a variant of archaic trill 'twiddle, spin'

entry.def: If you twirl something or if it twirls, it turns around and around with a smooth, fairly fast movement.

example.ex: Bonnie twirled her empty glass in her fingers...
example.tran: 邦妮用手指旋转着她的空杯子。

example.ex: All around me leaves twirl to the ground.
example.tran: 在我周围，树叶打着转儿纷纷飘落到地上。

entry.def: If you twirl, you turn around and around quickly, for example when you are dancing.

example.ex: Several hundred people twirl around the ballroom dance floor.
example.tran: 几百人在舞厅的舞池里旋转。

entry.def: If you twirl something such as your hair, you twist it around your finger.

example.ex: Sarah lifted her hand and started twirling a strand of hair.
example.tran: 萨拉抬起手来开始用手指缠绕一缕头发。

means.word_mean: 1. a sharp bend in a line produced when a line having a loop is pulled tight
1. turn in a twisting or spinning motion;

sentences.sentence: "The leaves swirled in the autumn wind"

auth_sentence.content: Pinky tossed his big Stetson with an expert twirl.
auth_sentence.res_content: Pinky tossed his big Stetson with an expert twirl.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Pinky tossed his big Stetson with an expert twirl.

auth_sentence.content: Most important, the styles had to have what he calls the twirl factor.
auth_sentence.res_content: Most important, the styles had to have what he calls the twirl factor.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Most important, the styles had to have what he calls the twirl factor.

auth_sentence.content: All in all, a nice feedback loop that will likely twirl far faster in 2011.
auth_sentence.res_content: All in all, a nice feedback loop that will likely twirl far faster in 2011.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: All in all, a nice feedback loop that will likely twirl far faster in 2011.

sentences.en: She twirled the pencil round in her fingers.
The dancers twirled across the stage.
sentences.cn: 跳舞者们旋转着穿过舞台。

sentences.en: She did a quick twirl to show off her dress.
sentences.cn: 她轻快地一转身,炫耀自己所穿的衣服。
